review.comment: Professional, creative, and timely woodworking. Highly recommend!

This barn door was absolutely EVERYTHING I had imagined. I am absolutely obsessed with the authenticity and uniqueness that is capturing the entire essence of my living room!!! Can’t be happier. Thank you!!!
Could not be happier with the finished product! Incredible quality, Kevin was extremely professional and easy to work with. Would absolutely recommend!

I was looking for custom size butcher block for my sit stand desk. I reached out to Kevin and he was super helpful and very responsive.

He made two butcher block tables tops for me and painted them as per my need. Finish was perfect and they look amazing. Will certainly consider him for any future needs.
I received a beautiful piece of dark stained oak as my desktop. Perfect addition for my home office. Reasonably priced. Reasonable time for production. Would definitely buy another item!

I Couldn't be happier!!!   Due to the nature of the  custom piece there was constant contact with the owner of the company.  The customer service was quick.  The piece I ordered was unique.  We will continue to use Hardtwood in the future for all our wood working.   You won't be disappointed!

This was a custom piece and it turned out just beautifully.  I had a number of ideas that I asked for and they were executed perfectly.  Definitely recommend for any barrel piece, especially if you are looking for something unique.
This table is very unique; bought it for my husband to display an antique train locomotive headlight.

Can’t say enough about how pleased we were with what Hardtwood created for my company, from creating an exact replica of my logo out of wood, then installing it and just to make it pop a bit more they placed LED lights behind it. Very professional, exceptional quality and most of all intuitive to my needs.
Kevin was great to work with.  Promised a ship date and got them out on time.  Quality is great and the tops look awesome.  Definitely recommend
Spectacular job by Hardtwood! Created a template and the mantle fit like a glove after the stone installation. Great craftsmanship!!
This barrel is absolutely gorgeous in our basement game room.  I would definitely purchase from this buyer again.  I wish he made wine barrel wall art.
I highly recommend Hardtwood Custom Woodworks! Kevin’s punctuality, responsiveness and professionalism is unmatchable. His work is incredible - Couldn’t be happier with the table he made!

I had such a great experience at Hardtwoodus. I had ordered custom shelves which were beautiful. They were delivered on time and the price point was fair. I had to have additional holes drilled on the shelves because of where the beams in my home were and as I’m local, the owner Kevin was willing to drill new holes at new extra charge. I suggest giving Hardtwoodus a chance for all your custom furniture needs.

I ordered a coffee counter and it exceeded my expectations! Great quality. Strong well built. and matched the aesthetic of my shoppe. Will continue to use this company again and again and again for all my custom pieces.

Hardtwood comes highly recommended. I ordered a custom dining room table. The picture speaks for itself. The quality was unbelievable and the way the extensions were built were innovative. Any time we have company the first thing they compliment is the table. Hardtwood does some amazing custom furniture. It’s delivered timely, the owner is responsive and the price is fair. I’m working with Hardtwood for several other custom pieces resulting from my positive experience.

We purchased a wine barrel liquor cabinet and it took quite a long time to come in. Not a big deal, but for product that takes several months to develop and ship (along with the price) I anticipated better quality.

The interior has chipping paint, that continues to fall everywhere. I have scrapped it off several times to no avail. In addition, the interior of the barrel is actually painted, not charred. No authentic barrel here from what I can see. The paint is not installed evenly, so some of the inside is black (great!) some is an off-white?? and some is natural wood color.

The outside of the barrel looks like the photo and is nice.

Overall, 2/5. Would not recommend - go elsewhere for your business. I tried reaching out to the owners on 4/2/21 (two weeks ago) and got no response.

Rarely do you receive a custom product that exceeds the image shown on an internet site.  I must say that the whiskey barrel I purchased from Hardtwood blew me away.  From the wood finish, to the steel bands and hardware including the swinging door, this was the perfect addition to a rustic billiard room I had just built.  I’ve already recommended it to a dozen or so friends...

I was searching for the perfect accent wood. I almost bought from home depot or lowes, but then i found this place online. I am extremly happy about the results of my project. They responded quick and made sure everything was perfect. Super happy customer here! Thank you!!!!

Been very happy with my purchase.
Also, got a lot of help from the owner.
Love my barrel cabinet to hold my whiskey.
Definitely would do business again.

Update.... 8/29 finally rcvd my shotski and it had our last name spelled wrong. Right on all the paper work but on the actual product it is spelled wrong... disappointed

I ordered an item for an anniversary gift 6 weeks ago and have not rcvd the order. I contacted PayPal and the seller sent me a tracking number and said my item shipped but the tracking number just shows that a label was prepared a week ago and never shipped. I've tried contacting the seller directly and have rcvd zero eespinses.
Really cool piece. This is the real deal. You can even smell the wine inside. It’s also very heavy, so get your dolly.

Thank you for this absolutely gorgeous piece! The seller was very communicative and even did an extra engraving at the top of the piece for us as it was a gift for my dad's 60th birthday. He even personally delivered it to make sure it would get here in time.
Never received my order from a month ago. Nobody responds via email or text, when you call nobody answers. This is a scam.  Had to request a refund through paypal
Awesome work! I ordered a barrel table and it came out great! I get so many compliments on it. Great service and great work!!

I ordered a custom wooden sign for my wedding and I absolutely loved it. Kevin was so helpful with recommending the color wood I should use and the sizing ! It came out perfect and the quality is amazing. I was pressed for timing when I ordered the sign and didn’t think I would be able to find anyone to do it but I received my order quickly with no issues, he was very understanding. My husband and I loved the sign so much we decided to hang it in our living room!
These bar stools are beautiful and very sturdy! We love them!

We ordered the hightop wine barrel, a number of barstools and a side tale from HardwoodUS. Kevin was amazing and great to work with! He responded within minutes to any questions I had. I love a rustic flair, but high quality. These items totally fit the bill and more. The construction, finish and detail were impeccable. All the items are level, no wobbling, which is a huge plus since you can't inspect prior to purchasing. The barstools arrived right away, but had to wait for the other two items due to a lack of good quality barrels. Kevin felt apologized profusely but wanted to make sure we only received the best. The wait was so worth it. I can't recommend them enough. Thank you Kevin.

We absolutely LOVE our new table!!! We couldnt have picked a better one!! Kevin was super easy to work with and helped us make some decisions on color and customizing the top! My only regret was we didnt buy the matching stools!! Our picture doesnt do it justice! He customized the top of the table for us and it matches our custom bar perfectly!!

I placed an order in late November for a high-top table and chairs as a Christmas present and never received my order.  After a number of email conversations and assurances I would receive the table and chairs, which never came to pass, I finally filed a dispute resolution with Etsy to receive a refund.  How very disappointing.
